main event: On May 24, 1951, witnesses in Chicago observed a cigar-shaped object with a long exhaust flame moving rapidly across the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as brilliant white and capable of oscillating back and forth in its flight pattern,The exhaust flame was estimated to be about a mile long,The sighting lasted approximately 12 minutes before the object disappeared,Witnesses included a civilian and his uncle who reported it to the authorities,The flight path began from an easterly direction and turned westerly before vanishing.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with an exhaust flame
witness description: civilians including a man and his uncle
